Dear Dr. Skomia s
Dr. Hickey has referred to me your letter of January 21
inquiring about future reports on our experimental television
project.
I believe you have already received a copy of our report
dealing with results in the teaching of ninth grade English
composition and ninth grade general science. Methods and
procedures in the teaching of second grade spelling were also
described in this report, but final results in this area will
not be available until we have analyzed the testing program
just completed at the end of this semester. We are planning to
issue a supplement to our report in which this phase of the
experiment will be described.
I shall be glad to send a copy of this on to you as soon
as it is available.
Sincerely yours,
MENGHAUSW
